text: Overseas () is an overseas constituency of Italy. It represents Italian people living outside of Italy. ==Members== Multi-member districts District Party Deputy N. Name Map 01 Europe Lega Simone Billi Five Star Movement Federica Onori Democratic Party Toni Ricciardi 02 South America Democratic Party Fabio Porta MAIE Franco Tirelli 03 North and Central America FdI Andrea Di Giuseppe Democratic Party Christian Diego Di Sanzo 04 Africa–Asia–Oceania–Antarctica Democratic Party Nicola Carè ==References== Category:Chamber of Deputies constituencies in Italy Chamber of Representatives
